overview: The journey of the Wanderer is born from a vision: a distant tower and a slender figure that surmounts it. What moves it is the desire for creation, but this cannot be carried out freely without a process of accumulation: hence the need to leave the cave in which it finds itself in order to seek a comparison with the world around, to experiment and experiment. The tower, on the other hand, will represent an opportunity to test a process of redefining one's own identity, a questioning of the self that is possible only through the contemplation of another destiny.
title: Carro
